draw_prompt: A golden retriever puppy being dragged on a leash through autumn leaves, its hind legs firmly planted backwards against the pavement. The owner's arm shows visible tension pulling forward in dim twilight, with swirling golden leaves contrasting against dark blue-grey shadows. Sharp focus on the dog's wrinkled forehead and resisting posture, rendered in bold charcoal sketch lines with watercolor washes.
